subject: Re: How to - Test Case for an Abstract class /  Inteface ?
msgSnippet: Hi Mike, Thank you very much for updating the FAQ. This has answered 1 of my questions I ve asked in Msg# 7168 & 7170. I hope same answer will be valid for
messageBody:
Hi Mike,

Thank you very much for updating the FAQ.

This has answered 1 of my questions I've asked in Msg# 7168 & 7170.

I hope same answer will be valid for testing Interfaces (2nd
question I've asked in Msg# 7168 & 7170).


Regards,
--- Shivprasad M. Bhide

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Mike Clark <mike@c...> wrote:
> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> >http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?AbstractTestCases
> >
> >Mike Clark: is this a FAQ yet?
> >
> >
>
> OK, it's live. Thanks for the heads-up!
>
> I also updated "Where should I put my test files?" based on some
input
> that it was too wishy-washy:
>
> http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#organize_1
>
> Well, now you know where I put my test files. :-)
>
> Mike
